items.summary: Create a single-page romantic experience that asks: "Shivani,\nWill you be my Valentine?" and presents exactly two choices labeled "yess" and "i dont like you".

Implement a live animated full-viewport background of many small neon hollow outlined hearts that continuously float upward from the bottom of the viewport to the top, using a pink-and-white neon palette.

Make the animated hearts background interactive so user input (mouse move on desktop and touch on iPad) visibly affects nearby hearts (e.g., gentle repulsion/drift/glow change) while keeping the upward floating motion.

Make the "i dont like you" button evade interaction so it cannot be clicked: on hover (desktop) and on attempted tap/press (touch devices), it moves to a new on-screen position that stays within the viewport and avoids overlapping the main "yess" area.
When the user clicks "yess", transition to a celebratory success state that displays a meme image and the exact text: "Hehehe Good gurl ðŸ˜šðŸ’—".
Add the required generated static meme image under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and render it directly from the frontend (no backend fetch).
